constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 22 (Thursday, February 3, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MASSIE:
H.R. 6590.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority for the Senior Citizens Tax
Elimination Act is found in Article I, Section 8, which gives
Congress the power to ``lay and collect'' taxes.
[Page H947]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: Senior Citizens Tax Elimination Act
